text: Billy Gene Poe II (born April 26, 1964) is a former American football offensive lineman. He spent one seasons with the NFL's Cincinnati Bengals in 1987, and later played for several teams in the Arena Football League and NFL Europe.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=poebil001 A four-year letterman at Morehead State from 1983–86, Poe was induced to the Morehead State Hall of Fame in 1998.http://www.msueagles.com/hof.aspx?hof=67&path;=&kiosk;= == References == Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:American football offensive linemen Category:Morehead State Eagles football players Category:Cincinnati Bengals players Category:Chicago Bruisers players Category:Frankfurt Galaxy players
title: Billy Poe
